OnBlockPlace.Description: Called whenever a player places a block

Player.Description: The player who placed a block

CanBuild.Description: Returns whether the player can build there or not

GetBlockAgainst.Description: Returns the block that the event block was placed against

GetBlockPlaced.Description: Returns the event block that was placed

GetHand.Description: Get the hand that placed the block

GetItemInHand.Description: Get the itemstack that the player is holding when they placed the block

ShouldBuild.Description: Set whether the place can build here or not

ShouldPlace.Description: Set whether the player can place a block or not
